sentences:
Vito Frazzi ( 1 August 1888 – 7 July 1975 ) was an Italian neo - romantic composer .
He was born in San Secondo Parmense , and studied at the Parma Conservatory , where he learnt composition from Guido Alberto Fano .
From 1912 to 1958 he taught piano , harmony , counterpoint and composition at the Florence Conservatory ; there he came into contact with Ildebrando Pizzetti , who was director of the conservatory from 1917 to 1923 , and who influenced Frazzi 's compositional style .
Frazzi also taught at the Accademia Musicale Chigiana from 1936 to 1963 .
His students included Bruno Bartolozzi , Bruno Bettinelli , Valentino Bucchi , Luigi Dallapiccola and Angelo Francesco Lavagnino .
He died in Florence on 7 July 1975 .
